name: Chicken Slide (Spaghetti Inc.)
description:
Can you help this poor slippery slidey chicken reach the end of each level?

Avoid all the blocks because they make the chicken explode (for some reason)!

This game is hard and I mean really hard. I hear you say, well it can't be that hard right? Wrong. Try to beat every level and you will see what I mean. I hope you have fun :^)
